mapper.select: SELECT o.order_num, o.member_num, o.order_date, o.order_status, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_image, i.item_info, i.item_status, i.item_date, p.total_price, p.purchase_ok, p.payment_date + 7 FROM purchase p JOIN anvd_order o ON (p.order_num = o.order_num) JOIN item i ON (o.item_num = i.item_num) ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
